items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS SWEATER
items.body: So cute and perfect fit! Ordered for a party and this sweater had just the right amount of style and appeal!! It exceeded my expectations. Read more
items.author: GALE LAR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Candy cane Christmas this year!
items.body: Love it! Go with our Christmas theme this year, “candy cane crunch Christmas! “Got lots of compliments and many of my family members have one as well! Read more
items.author: Great Auntie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Christmas/Winter Acrylic Sweater
items.body: Nice cozy sweater in soft acrylic for winter and the holidays. I will wear this with white pants and that will look good. Funny, a lot of fashion brands are showing white pants for winter this year. I like that fashion decided to break the “no white after Labor Day rule”. This sweater is easy care washer and dryer and gets even softer with time. It is well made and durable. This is a size large. Read more
items.author: Beladuka

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and very pretty
items.body: Comfortable fit! Very soft! Perfect for Christmas! So pretty! Read more
items.author: Mary Furman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ★★★★★ Cozy, Festive, and Perfect for the Holidays
items.body: ★★★★★ Cozy, Festive, and Perfect for the Holidays This holiday sweater is incredibly cute and even better in person. The relaxed, loose fit gives it a comfy, casual vibe, and the slight stretch makes it easy to move in. The size guide was accurate, but if you're between sizes, going up one does give a nice, roomier feel. The material is soft and skin-friendly—100% acrylic, lightweight, and breathable. It has a semi-sheer texture that works well as a versatile layering piece for both indoor and outdoor wear throughout the season. The design is truly festive. The Fair Isle pattern featuring reindeer, candy cane hearts, and snowflakes is adorable without being over the top. The classic crew neck and long sleeves make it easy to pair with just about anything, and it gives off that cozy, cute, slightly slouchy look that's perfect for holiday cheer. This sweater is also super easy to style. It looks great with leggings, jeans, boots, or sneakers. Whether you're dressing up for a Christmas party, staying casual for everyday wear, traveling, or taking holiday photos, it's a perfect choice. It also makes a great gift for Christmas or winter birthdays. Care instructions are straightforward. It arrives vacuum-packed, so a quick wash and iron help restore the shape. Hand washing, laying flat to dry, and avoiding bleach will keep it looking new. Overall, this is a soft, festive, and stylish holiday sweater that’s comfortable enough for all-day wear. Highly recommend! Great Value for Money! Read more
items.author: Breakpoint Tech

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money
items.body: I’m so bummed. The smell from this upon opening was awful. I’ve just hand washed it per instructions. It still smells. I’m hoping it will be better when it dries. Unfortunately I have to hang dry it. So we’ll see how long it takes since it’s a double layer sweater. I did try it on but it was quite itchy and uncomfortable and I immediately took it off. Something else I hope changes after the washing I did. The fit was fine. It does have some stretch but not a lot. For a medium size sweater it is big, so keep that in mind. The design is cute. Everything else about it is not worth the cost. It’s definitely not worth the $34 let alone the presale price of $50. Read more
items.author: Steph

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kinda Cute for an Ugly Sweater (:
items.body: I'm really pleased with this cute little sweater. I'm going to say it runs a little big. I usually wear a medium and got this in a small by mistake, but it fits. It hits my waist just right and it still comfortable. It's not too heavy, which is nice as I live where it could be t-shirt weather or below freezing for Christmas, so something in between is usually ideal. The colors are true to the photo..maybe even a little brighter. I'm really happy with it all around and am looking forward to wearing it to a Christmas brunch in a few weeks :) Please note this though, because I didn't notice it: HAND WASH ONLY Not a huge deal for me as I do a fair bit of delicate laundering, but if it's a big deal for you, find another ugly sweater to love! Read more
items.author: a different light

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable “ugly” Christmas sweater
items.body: This sweater is really cute. I can’t wait to wear it during the holidays. It’s not thick but it is warm. I got my usual size medium and it fits pretty well. The cut is a little boxy and the sweater is on the short side ( I’m 5’ 6”) but I still think it looks adorable. Read more
items.author: Dorothy F.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red-01, Hs-red, Elk-black, Elk-red, Elk-green, Hs-green, Hs-black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
